title: Kara3
author: Kara3
content: Trading is a lifetime skill that is always beneficial if you know what you are doing, the biggest mistake of traders is trading alt that most times doesn't obey market structure, when it comes to cryptocurrency, trade only Bitcoin.Bitcoin doesn't just give you profit, it gives you security, it obeys market structure, for the past 2yrs I have been trading, I only have losess only when I trading Alt, price action trading I utilize will trading always gives me result when trading Bitcoin, but when it comes to Alt I really do feel as if am gambling, so my fellow traders, trade only Bitcoin, I don't know if anyone feel the same way?

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: Bitcoin is always safer than ALT coins so trading with bitcoins will have less chance of loss but there are some ALT coins that I don't think would be too bad to invest in. Everything will depend on the trading skills, if you have perfect trading skills then it is possible to make good money by trading in ALT coins.  I have always preferred Bitcoin for long term investment, and I believe that no coin can beat Bitcoin for long term investment, but in some cases I have noticed that trading ALT coins is relatively more profitable than Bitcoin.  It is possible to invest the same amount of capital only the risk is slightly higher. If we can accept the risk then surely we can make profit by trading ALT coins as well.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I am not an expert trader,  but when I tried trading some months back,  I was making a good profit from a particular coin but not Bitcoin and as a long the line I decided to dive into multiple coins trading and at that point I lost my entire capital,  why am I saying this is because trading a single pair is more safer than trading multiple pairs. Bitcoin is the most. Suitable in that regard and at that we all will look into that to be able to prove how safe it is to trade only assets that have less volatility like bitcoin.

comments.author: Unbunplease
comments.body: To trade only bitcoin, you need to be well versed in trading at least Futures and other trading instruments. It is also necessary to have a good understanding of trading strategies, to set stop loss correctly, and to have iron nerves. Bitcoin now, in my opinion, is more suitable for active trading than for a simple holding

comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on September 28, 2023, 07:19:52 PMTrading is a lifetime skill that is always beneficial if you know what you are doing, the biggest mistake of traders is trading alt that most times doesn't obey market structure, when it comes to cryptocurrency, trade only Bitcoin.Trading is more difficult than investing, and the danger associated in trading causes people to lose faith in it, much like investing. While investing takes time to enjoy the benefits, trading only requires you to make a decision and take certain risks that may or may not be in your favour.QuoteBitcoin doesn't just give you profit, it gives you security, it obeys market structure, for the past 2yrs I have been trading, I only have losess only when I trading Alt, price action trading I utilize will trading always gives me result when trading Bitcoin, but when it comes to Alt I really do feel as if am gambling, so my fellow traders, trade only Bitcoin, I don't know if anyone feel the same way? Many people trade altcoins because of their high volatility, they follow market movements, particularly those altcoins with poor returns and reputations in the crypto market. They can readily multiply by ten or more due to minor market changes induced by their developers or market trends. They consider it as a get rich quick coin while trading it and ignore the danger involved, which is negligible when they invest in bitcoin instead.

comments.body: High risk will get high return and low risk automatically with low return, its comparison when priority trading with Bitcoin or altcoin, actually many trader still trade with altcoin because have high profitable than have to trade with Bitcoin and small fund not enough to earn much profit as short or long term trade. comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on September 28, 2023, 07:19:52 PMTrading is a lifetime skill that is always beneficial if you know what you are doing, the biggest mistake of traders is trading alt that most times doesn't obey market structure, when it comes to cryptocurrency, trade only Bitcoin.Bitcoin doesn't just give you profit, it gives you security, it obeys market structure, for the past 2yrs I have been trading, I only have losess only when I trading Alt, price action trading I utilize will trading always gives me result when trading Bitcoin, but when it comes to Alt I really do feel as if am gambling, so my fellow traders, trade only Bitcoin, I don't know if anyone feel the same way?The same way investing in many coins can be dangerous, and not as profitable as investing in just bitcoins, trading many and random cryptocurrency is not still the proper way to trade cryptocurrency, and may not also be as profitable as when you as a trader decide to focus on trading majorly bitcoins. Smart traders know that trading bitcoin is the best choice, but they sometimes trade other cryptocurrencies because they can, and they make profit from it. You will not be a smart trader to know that you can trade other cryptocurrency and make profit from it, but decide to just limit yourself to bitcoins alone. Sincerely trade according to your expertise. If you know you can do it, go for it! If you still have doubts, then play it safe and focus mainly on bitcoins.

comments.author: jeraldskie11
comments.body: The volatility of each coin varies, with Bitcoin having the lowest volatility. Trading simply Bitcoin would be preferable if you wanted to trade more safely, but the potential gain would be lesser than with altcoins. Trading alternative coins is the only way to increase your chances of receiving a significant reward, but since alternative coins are very volatile, you must be careful with your trades and it is wise to increase the size of your stop loss because volatile coins are more vulnerable to manipulation. Before you trade, you must screen a coin and backtest it.

comments.author: AliMan
comments.body: It's hard to figure out trading only with Bitcoin, since it has a higher value compared from the last 5 years. So, the only options I got was to invest with altcoins but there's no greater assurance to acquire huge profit because it's more volatile than bitcoin. Many projects link with different tokens, has a bad reputation due to scammers took advantage with the ico projects and several so called legit platform that don't exist in the market.Much better, it we only focused with bitcoin while the value was cheaper instead of having some alternatives that has no assurance in the future.

comments.author: koang
comments.body: Trading is not all about being right and making a profit.It's about being a risk manager, controlling emotions, and understanding the bigger picture.Trading is a lonely business, and we are our managers and should be monitoring ourselves.For me, Bitcoin is savings, not for trading, because I don't trust banks.I only trade good Alts, like Eth, BNB, etc

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Pretty much. Most alts are ponzi schemes because there are not enough people believe in these projects. So when an alt pumps to a ridiculous price, it dumps even harder because the whale that holds a big stake in the project dumps everything he has. They do that because they don’t believe in the future of the project. Bitcoin is not like that obviously. Since bitcoin is the first and the original cryptocurrency, even if some people dumps it, there will always be a strong support on the buying side. That doesn’t mean all alts are trash though. Some of them pretty decent but i still don’t see a reason to waste time on them.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on September 28, 2023, 07:19:52 PMTrading is a lifetime skill that is always beneficial if you know what you are doing, the biggest mistake of traders is trading alt that most times doesn't obey market structure, when it comes to cryptocurrency, trade only Bitcoin.Bitcoin doesn't just give you profit, it gives you security, it obeys market structure, for the past 2yrs I have been trading, I only have losess only when I trading Alt, price action trading I utilize will trading always gives me result when trading Bitcoin, but when it comes to Alt I really do feel as if am gambling, so my fellow traders, trade only Bitcoin, I don't know if anyone feel the same way?What exactly do you mean by "market structure"? You mean a certain pattern? Well, none of the crypto currencies follows that certain structure. Not even bitcoin. And that's why we say that crypto currencies are very volatile and unpredictable. But, yes, I do agree that bitcoin is less volatile when compared to altcoin, specially coins that are not well known. When trading bitcoin, there is less risk associated. Chances of you losing everything is low. But it doesn't mean that you won't lose anything. When trading altcoins , you will be taking more risk, but the profit is also higher when if you can take advantage of the volatility. But I wouldn't say alt coin trading/investing is gambling, unless you don't know what you are doing.
